title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying honey in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a dead person buying honey in a dream. Some people search for a dream interpretation of a dead person buying honey in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying honey in a dream. Seeing a deceased person buying honey in a dream may mean many good things that will come to the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God. Whoever dreams that a dead person was buying honey from bees may indicate the abundance of sustenance that will come to the dreamer in the coming days, by God. I know. Anyone who sees in a dream that a deceased person is buying honey may indicate great effort and effort by the dreamer to earn money. Seeing a dead person buying honey in a dream may indicate a large inheritance that the dreamer may receive from one of his relatives, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying Furniture in a dreamIn the event that one sees that the deceased was buying furniture for the home, this may indicate positive changes that occur to the dreamer to a large extent during this period. When you see the deceased buying furniture in the neighborhood in a dream, this may indicate good changes that occur to the dreamer during this period. The period, thanks to God. Whoever dreams of a dead person buying furniture for the house in a dream, may indicate great livelihood and good events that will happen to the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God. Seeing the deceased buying furniture for his house in a dream may indicate changes that will happen to the people of the house or joys that will come. To them, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying vegetables in a dream. In the event that you see a dead person buying vegetables in a dream, this may indicate the great choices that come to the dreamer at that time, thanks to God. When you see the dead buying vegetables for the living in your dream, this may indicate abundance The good and ample diet that you will have during this time, and God knows best. Whoever dreams that the deceased was buying vegetables for the neighborhood may indicate future joys for the dreamer at that time thanks to God. In the event that he sees the deceased buying vegetables, this could indicate the end of debts and financial crises. Which the dreamer faced in the previous period, thanks to God. Interpretation of dreams for the dead person to buy fish in a dream. If one sees that the deceased was buying fish in a dream, this may indicate the end of worries and sorrow from the dreamer’s life during this period, thanks to God. Everyone who sees in a dream that the dead person He was buying a fish, which could indicate rejection of the intense sadness that the dreamer was suffering from at that time, and God knows best. And a dream of a deceased person buying fish in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. And in the event that one sees that the deceased He was buying fish and serving fried fish. This may indicate that he heard happy news during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person buying medicine in a dream. If a person sees a deceased person buying medicine in a dream, this may indicate his faults that were present in his life, and God knows best. If a person sees that the dead person was buying medicine, this may indicate that he asked for prayers for him from his household at that time. Seeing the dead person buying medicine in a dream may mean that the dead person needed prayers.

title: Interpretation of a dream about worms in the hair for a married woman, worms coming out of the hair in a dream for a married woman, and interpretation of a dream about worms falling out of the hair of a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about worms in a married woman’s hair is one of the visions that cause a feeling mixed with anxiety and confusion in the dreamer’s soul, because the worm is a disgusting insect, especially when it emerges from the hair, and it is one of the first feminine manifestations of a woman and the source. Therefore, the person with the vision wants to know the meanings that this vision holds for her, and this is what we will know together in some detail by referring to the opinions of the great interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about worms in a married woman’s hair by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about worms in a married woman’s hair? Although Worms in the hair are disgusting things that every woman and girl is afraid of, however, their interpretation in a dream has a completely different meaning, because it brings food, which is good for a married woman and family stability that she has never seen before. If a married woman sees worms coming out profusely from her hair and she She suffers from delayed childbearing, so this is a good sign that God will bless her with pregnancy as soon as possible. However, if a married woman sees abundant worms coming out of her hair and alienating her husband from her sight, then this is an indication that the stage of turmoil and quarrels has ended and the relationship between them has improved. However, if the married woman is suffering From some diseases and she sees worms coming out of her hair, this means that her recovery date is approaching and she will be relieved of the aches and pains that have continued for long periods of time. The next few days will be in good health. Interpretation of a dream about worms in a married woman’s hair by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a married woman with worms coming out of her hair is a sign that she is going through a difficult period marred by a lot of thinking about many responsibilities and professions, but the worm coming out is a symbol of that. . The end of that period and the beginning of a new transitional phase in which her various circumstances improve for the better. Also, a large worm coming out of her hair indicates that the fortuneteller will take a position of importance and exaltation, which will improve his financial circumstances. A married woman’s dream of worms coming out of her hair while she is in a state of extreme sadness is interpreted as experiencing There is a stage where she feels very upset because she is wasting her time on trivial matters. However, if she sees multi-colored worms coming out of her head, this indicates that she will be exposed to some obstacles and financial crises as a result of losing her husband in business, but she must support him until conditions improve for that. The best. The section includes interpretation of dreams on an Egyptian website. You can find many interpretations and questions from followers by Googling the Egyptian dream interpretation website. I dreamed of worms in my hair for a married woman. A married woman seeing worms coming out of her hair means that she will get rid of the intense anxiety that controlled her in the past, as it indicates. To improve the relations between her and her husband and that the husband’s financial situation will improve. For the better, but if the worm comes out of the hair dead, it is a shameful vision that portends that the viewer will be exposed to some problems that will make her live in a constant state of thinking. But if a pregnant woman sees worms coming out of her hair, this is evidence that she will give birth to a boy and that the period of pregnancy and childbirth will pass quickly.

title: What is the interpretation of extracting a tooth in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and leading scholars?

preview.html: To remove a tooth in a dream: seeing teeth is considered one of the visions surrounded by multiple connotations among jurists due to the large number of their issues and the complexity of their details. There are certain aspects in which the vision is desirable, while the vision is in other aspects. It is considered undesirable. Positively or negatively, the context of the dream. To remove a tooth in a dream. Teeth are an indicator of a person’s health and physical safety, and enjoyment of longevity, prosperity, and offspring. Teeth symbolize relatives, and if they are bad or defective, then this is a defect in the person with whom the age corresponds. And whoever sees that he has his tooth removed, this is a sign of estrangement. Or serious strife between him and his relatives, and if he pushes the tooth with his tongue until it falls out, his relationship or otherwise will be cut off, and it can be removed from it. Having a tooth extracted for some reason, such as feeling pain or having a defect in it, indicates salvation from worries and burdens, and escaping from problems and dangers. But if he sees If a tooth falls out, this symbolizes the death of a grandfather or grandmother, or that one of them suffers from a serious health problem. Extracting a tooth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that teeth indicate relatives of the family and that each tooth meets a member of that family, and the front and right teeth indicate males, and the right teeth or The upper teeth indicate grandfather. As for the lower and left teeth, they indicate female relatives, and the lower and left molars indicate grandmother, and whoever sees the molar falling out, this is evidence of the closest guardianship of the grandfather or grandmother, depending on the banker’s location. Pulling a tooth indicates a dispute between the fortuneteller and his family, and he may enter into a serious dispute with the elders of the family, especially if he pulled the tooth by pushing it with his tongue. And whoever sees that he pulled his tooth due to an illness inside him, this means that he will be saved from worries and sorrows or severing a relationship that links him to a member of his family. This may be due to the corruption or bad behavior of that person. Methods and nature. Removing a tooth in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that teeth mean well-being, health, and enjoyment of vitality, and whoever sees teeth falling out, this indicates longevity, unlike his peers or relatives, and this includes a kind of alienation, loss, and sadness. Because his family died before him. The molar represents adults and those who receive advice and guidance from them, and the molar is a symbol of grandparents or grandchildren, and the loss of a tooth represents the death of the grandfather. Having a tooth removed indicates heavy worries and burdens, and false beliefs and beliefs, and whoever has a tooth removed because of a defect in it, this is evidence of a way out. Of adversity. The same applies to extracting a molar if it is black or has a defect. It indicates dealing with outstanding issues, resolving a crisis within the family, or repairing a defect in one of its relatives. Extracting a molar in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says that teeth indicate that you are spending money on beneficial things. Or you pay zakat to dispel worry and sadness, when you see the cleanliness of the teeth, as the whiteness of the teeth is interpreted to mean longevity, growth and status. Falling teeth indicates illness, weakness or affliction that befalls the family or relatives, and the extraction of a tooth deserves praise if it has a blemish, blackness, blemish or defect. Illness and other things that indicate alienation and hatred. Whoever sees that he removes the tooth and then returns it to M

title: Interpretation of a dream about traveling with my daughter in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about traveling with my daughter in a dream We will present below what scholars narrated about the interpretation of a dream about traveling with my daughter in a dream, all of this and more details that interest you and others. Interpretation of a dream about traveling with my daughter in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about traveling with my daughter in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a daughter traveling in a dream could be a sign that desires will be fulfilled and that God is Most High and All-Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees his daughter traveling, this may indicate that he is trying to achieve goals, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing traveling by plane could be Evidence of success, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to a beautiful country in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about traveling to a beautiful country in a dream. We did not find specific explanations for his vision, except that seeing the trip and it was a pleasant trip can express the achievement of goals, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees herself traveling and the trip was difficult, then she may This indicates trouble, and God knows the unseen. When you see a single girl traveling in a dream, this could be a sign of good changes, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about traveling with my brother in a dream. title: Interpretation of talking and speaking in a dream Seeing a conversation with someone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of talking with a single woman, to a married woman, to a pregnant woman, to a divorced woman, whether to a dead friend, lover, father-in-law, chief prophet, celebrity, newborn, inability to speak, and more. Interpretation of speech in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Clear and expressive speech in a dream is praiseworthy, especially if it is Eloquent or with good expressions. If the dreamer hears sweet words such as praise or thanks, then in his waking life he expects to hear good news. Perhaps dreaming of a beautiful and elegant speech indicates the appearance of something happy in addition to the sweetness or sweetness of the words. As for expressing negative or bad expressions, it is in the dream. It expresses something bad, and perhaps the dream reveals negative thoughts or energy latent in the dreamer’s soul or in his subconscious. In a dream, it is advisable to speak foreign languages, provided that the speech is understandable and leads to a clear meaning. It is also praiseworthy to speak pure Arabic because Arabic is the language of the Qur’an. The Holy Prophet and the language of the hadiths of the Holy Prophet, which is one of the most common and widely used languages. Talking in a dream about what should be hidden is evidence of wasting money or wisdom on undeserving people. Ancient interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi hated speaking in the language or style of poetry because poetry in interpretation expresses Hypocrisy, lying, and hypocrisy. Since speech in visions is similar to writing, both are interpreted according to the content of spoken or written statements. Gossip in a dream is abhorrent in Islamic and Western interpretations, as it has been attributed to the German philosopher Friedrich Nietzsche by saying: “The word kills the deed.” The best speech in The dream is what happens between him and him. This has positive effects. Spend them on what expresses self-control or self-restraint, and some of them express the purity and chastity of the soul. The best speech or speech is what is heard by wise men, sages, sheikhs, imams, teachers, professors, and those of the state or government, such as princes, presidents, and kings. As for the best speech and speech heard in visions, it is speech. God and messengers or angels and prophets. God’s words are praiseworthy and express the status and prestige of the seer. The words of the angels are good news or a warning, and whoever speaks in his dream to a prophet of the messengers such as Moses, Jesus, Muhammad, Yahya, Joseph, or Zechariah, he will have the same meaning as what was said or heard the words. Of the prophets is true. There is no prophet sent by God who speaks out of passion. Talking to the dead is real because they are in the house of truth, and talking to animals indicates prestige and authority. The basis of this interpretation is that the Prophet Solomon - may God bless him and grant him peace - addressed ants, ants and others, and this was mentioned in the stories of the Holy Qur’an. The early translators disliked speaking an incomprehensible foreign language, and it was said in explaining this: An innovation in spending it is in the language of the person seeing it, so he is misled or lost. He continues to hear her. Talking in a dream is important, that is, the interpretation is made according to the meaning and content of the speech. Whoever spoke with his friend in a dream and the content of his talk was friendly, familiar or positive, the dream shows his sincerity. Talking with a loved one or a loved one in a dream is a very important matter.

Talking to the dead is real because they are in the house of truth, and talking to animals indicates prestige and authority. The basis of this interpretation is that the Prophet Solomon - may God bless him and grant him peace - addressed ants, ants and others, and this was mentioned in the stories of the Holy Qur’an. The early translators disliked speaking an incomprehensible foreign language, and it was said in explaining this: An innovation in spending it is in the language of the person seeing it, so he is misled or lost. He continues to hear her. Talking in a dream is important, that is, the interpretation is made according to the meaning and content of the speech. Whoever spoke with his friend in a dream and the content of his talk was friendly, familiar or positive, the dream shows his sincerity. Talking with a loved one or a loved one in a dream is a very important matter.

title: Small black ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of seeing small black ants in the house and the interpretation of seeing small black ants on clothes in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing small black ants in a dream may indicate anxiety and fear for the dreamer, but we find that its reference in the Holy Qur’an shows the extent to which ants try to work to secure their livelihood under a strict system despite their weak structure, but despite all this they do. We cannot deny that it is harmful when bitten, so the dreamer fears it in reality. And in the dream as well, and here we will learn about all the meanings of seeing it and what the translators explain throughout the article. Interpretation of seeing small black ants in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing small black ants in a dream? The vision represents approaching family and friends and asking them from time to time, as ants live in groups in reality, so seeing them in a dream is a sign of concentration and lack of separation. His presence on the dreamer’s bed is a sign of goodness and abundance for his children, and the blessing he has given him in this wonderful offspring thanks to God Almighty. The vision indicates the dreamer’s huge and abundant food, which will make him achieve all his many goals and desires. Which changes the course of his life for the better. Perhaps seeing him in a dream indicates marriage to a single person and the happiness associated with it, especially if he is a frequent lover of bed. It could be a sign for the dreamer that his financial situation will improve a lot and he will be freed from all debts and will not feel any psychological harm anymore. The dreamer seeing termites is great news that he will get a lot of money and his dreams will come true as soon as possible. Some unpleasant connotations of this dream: The dream may lead to exhaustion and a feeling of pain, but the dreamer must be patient and pray to God to comfort him soon. His vision may also indicate that There is someone who speaks ill of him in secret, and here we find that ignoring is the best way to go. If the ants are red and not black, this leads him to commit many sins that he must repent of immediately. His presence in poetry is an expression of falling into the worries of work, But he is trying hard to solve it. An ant bird in a dream indicates excessive exhaustion for the one who suffers from pain. Ants wandering around in food are evidence of high prices. Ants emerging from the dreamer’s body in a dream, or from any other body, is good news of martyrdom for the sake of God. To obtain The most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. What is the interpretation of seeing small black ants in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Our Great Imam believes that the vision announces good and evil according to the form of the dream. It may lead to the dreamer’s continuous pursuit of gain. A living. It also indicates that the dreamer is putting a lot of effort into improving his life and achieving his great ambitions. The frequent entry of ants into the house is an important sign of a wonderful future free of anxiety and crises. If ants are found in a child, this is good news for success and things will continue in the future. Its natural course without worrying about the consequences. If black ants appear on the wall, this is an important expression of the love of others and their cooperation towards the dreamer because of his good morals and good behavior. title: Interpretation of dreams about falling from a plane in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about falling from a plane in a dream is one of the very disturbing dreams that anyone can see in a dream and wants to know its meaning and interpretations, so today let us learn all of these interpretations in detail. Interpretation of dreams about falling from a plane in a dreamIf a divorced woman sees that her ex-husband is riding with her in the same The plane, this is evidence that she lacks self-confidence and needs trust. To dream that you are boarding a plane with a divorced man in a dream is a sign of the instability in which the woman was living at that time. To dream of boarding a plane with a divorced man is a sign of communication with her ex-husband. And mend their relationship. The dream of riding a plane in a dream with a divorced man indicates that the woman will soon marry her divorced husband or another man. Interpretation of the dream of flying a plane with a dead person in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he is flying his plane with the dead while talking to them, this is a sign that the dreamer He will travel soon. Dreaming of riding a plane with a dead person in a dream is a sign of the long journey that the dreamer will suffer and being away from his family. Seeing yourself traveling with dead people in a dream is evidence of the long life that the dreamer enjoys. Dreaming of flying a plane with dead people in a dream is Evidence of the enormous livelihood that the person with the vision will obtain. Interpretation of a dream about riding a plane with someone you love in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he boarded a plane with someone close to him, this is evidence of the fulfillment of desires and dreams at that time. A young man’s dream of riding a plane with someone he loves in The dream is a sign of his success in life and his proximity to business trips. When a married woman dreams that she is traveling by plane with some of her loved ones, this is evidence of her good access to life and the fulfillment of her desires. Seeing an ordinary girl boarding a plane with someone she loves in a dream is evidence of her closeness to marrying a young man. He has high morals. Interpretation of dreams about a plane falling in front of him and not exploding in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream a plane falling in front of him and not exploding, this is a sign of a big problem that he will face soon, but it will be solved soon. When you see a plane crashing and not exploding in a dream, this is an indication of the sins and transgressions committed by the dreamer. This will happen soon. The plane fell in a dream and did not explode, which indicates its ability to overcome crises and difficulties in the coming period. If one sees that a plane fell in a dream and did not explode, this is an indication of the psychological crises that he is experiencing and from which he will soon get rid of. Interpretation of a dream about landing A plane in the house in a dream: Whoever dreams of a plane landing in her house, this indicates the coming goodness for the people of the house in the coming period. Dreaming of a plane landing in the house in a dream, is a sign of the traveler and expatriate returning to his family. Seeing a plane landing in a dream is a sign of the arrival of abundant goodness for the people of the house. This house. When you see an airplane over the dead in a dream, this is a sign of the high status that the head of the house will have. Interpretation of a dream about flying an airplane in a dream. If one sees that he is flying in an airplane in a dream, this is a sign of joy and happiness for the person of the vision for the past period.

title: What is the interpretation of dogs in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of dogs in a dream Dogs are animals known for their loyalty to their owner and are distinguished by their different types and multiple colors, and many people have a hobby of raising dogs at home, and when the dreamer sees dogs in a dream, he may be shocked and perhaps seriously afraid and seeks to know the interpretation of that, so in this article we consider together the most important things said in the language of jurists from the interpretation of this vision, so follow us. Interpretation of dogs in a dream Interpretation scholars say that the dreamer's vision of dogs in a dream means that there are many enemies surrounding him, but they do not harm him. If the dreamer sees a female dog in a dream, this means that he has a dominant leadership personality and does not take anyone's opinion into account in his life. But when the dreamer sees dogs in a dream attacking and wounding her, this indicates that she will suffer in life from difficulties and problems in the coming days. If you see dogs drooling in your dream, this means that she will hear many bad words from people close to her. If someone dreams of a dog attacking him and tearing his clothes, this means that he has lost the most precious thing in his life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is feeding on different dogs, this means abundant nutrition, And relieve severe anxiety and remove fears about it. Interpretation of dogs in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing dogs in a dream indicates the many sins that she commits in her life. If the dreamer sees a barking dog in a dream, this means the need to back down from the bad things he does and repent to God. But if a woman sees hunting dogs in a dream, this portends good news and happy occasions that she will soon be happy with. If the dreamer sees himself leaning on a dog in a dream, this symbolizes victory over enemies and getting rid of them. If the dreamer sees himself turning into a dog in a dream, it indicates that he has acquired a lot of science that does not benefit a person. A married man, if he sees dogs barking in a dream, means that his wife has betrayed him and that they will divorce. Interpretation of dogs in a dream for a single woman Interpretation scholars say that seeing a single girl with black dogs means that there is an evil person trying to get close to her and she must beware of him. If the dreamer sees red dogs in a dream, this indicates that he has fallen into various problems and difficulties in life. If you see brown dogs in a dream, this means that there are friends around them who feel Jealous of what you enjoy. As for seeing a girl in a dream with white dogs, this indicates the progress of a righteous person with whom she enjoys comfort and many good things. If the girl is working and sees dogs attacking and biting her in a dream, this indicates that she is not comfortable in her work because of some people. Seeing a dreamer of dogs biting her right hand in a dream means material losses that he will suffer and suffer from. If you see a white dog in a dream and you are very afraid of it, this means that you will suffer from problems and fears in life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that she is playing with small dogs, this means that she will achieve many goals and achieve

title: Snow falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of snow falling from the sky in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of snow and rain falling in a dream.

preview.html: Snow falling in a dream carries many interpretations and associations, the most famous of which is opening doors to livelihood and increasing money, and many other connotations that we will discuss in detail today. Snow falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of snow falling in a dream? The interpretation of a dream that snow is falling indicates that it is time to end Worries, anxiety, and an end to problems. However, if the dreamer is sick, the dream indicates his recovery from the illness. Snow in the dream of a man working in a prestigious place is a sign of promotion that will help improve his standard of living. Seeing snow on his hand indicates that the dreamer is wasting and spending his money. On things that are meaningless and useless. Seeing snow and rain at the same time indicates that the dreamer will face many problems that will make him stand still and not move forward in his life for a long time. Snow falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of snow falling according to Ibn Sirin is evidence of healing. From illness, it also showed that seeing ice melting in a dream is a sign of the collapse of worries. Whoever sees snow falling on his shoulders in his dream, the dream indicates that he will travel to a place far from his country and the travel period will be long. Anyone who dreams that snow is falling at a different time is... A sign that the dreamer will be exposed to arguments and gossip from people in his social circle. Whoever sees snow falling from the sky and flooding the ground, indicates food and benefit that the dreamer will receive in the coming days. The dream also shows that the dreamer is always seeking legitimate food. Seeing snow falling In the summer, it is evidence of upcoming good news, but if snow falls in the winter, this indicates the arrival of bad news. Ibn Ghannam says that snow falling at the wrong time is a sign of paying off debts and alleviating worries. Snow falling in a single woman’s dream. The interpretation of a dream of snow for a single woman indicates Stability of the dreamer's life and she will succeed in her academic, social and emotional life. Snow in an unmarried woman's dream symbolizes that she will get a lot of money in the coming period, and there is a high probability that this money will come from an inheritance. Snow and rain falling at the same time shows that she becomes helpless when faced with Problems in her life and she is unable to solve them alone, so she always needs the support of others. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that an unmarried woman who dreams of walking on a snowy ground indicates that she will reach her goal. Snow falling in a dream for a married woman, and the appearance of snow in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she She will enjoy a good and abundant living, and her marital relationship will be characterized by stability in the coming period, while her accumulation at home expresses the worries and responsibilities she bears. A married woman who sees her body covered in snow indicates that she will be exposed to difficulties and problems in her life. The months of pregnancy will be free of all pain. Eating ice for a married woman is evidence that she will be exposed to a health crisis in the future that will cause her to lose part of her health and remain in bed for a long time until she recovers. From

title: More than 100 interpretations of a dream about a comb according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Comb in a dream: There are many dreams that we constantly dream about without knowing their meaning, such as the dream of a comb, but when we search for it, we clearly understand what the vision means, as it can carry many associations or signals that express the near future. You will learn about the interpretation of a dream of a comb in a dream for everyone through this detailed article. Interpretation of a dream of a comb in a dream The interpretation of seeing a comb in a dream has many evidence, such as: It is beneficial to the dreamer in general because this goodness can be in the family, work, or with his friends. The symbol indicates A comb in a dream also indicates renewal in work or friendships that open up important areas and great strength for him. Seeing this dream confirms the good morals of this dreamer, which makes everyone who knows him respect and appreciate him. This vision is an important indicator of the approach of benefit from an acquaintance, and this benefit It will enrich him greatly. The dream also indicates that there is a new business undertaken by the dreamer, and it will be successful and will make him develop into something better. If the comb has many teeth, this is a good omen for the fortuneteller, because it expresses that he will receive an inheritance, or money. If his type Gold in a dream, this indicates an upcoming opportunity for the dreamer that he should not miss, so he must take advantage of it to change his life for the better. Not being able to comb the hair in a dream indicates that the dreamer cannot overcome the problems that are presented to him, no matter how simple they are, and this confirms that he A person who is constantly hesitant. The color of the comb in a dream makes the vision completely different: We find that the red color indicates his emotional feelings towards his partner because it expresses his close relationship with his partner and his lover. As for the blue color, it is a clear sign of excellence in his field of study, and this makes him surrounded by haters from all sides. Therefore, he must be careful about them. If they are white, then it indicates the great joy that this dreamer is experiencing, and this is the result of his good thinking about protecting himself from every danger. Interpretation of a dream about a comb by Ibn Sirin Our imam Ibn Sirin explains to us important meanings of this vision, which are: Evidence of Happiness and goodness in the life of the fortuneteller. This goodness could be the result of some acquaintances around him or from people you know well, who provide him with some help in achieving what he wants. It is also an indication of the dreamer’s good deeds that endear him to everyone and to his Lord. This vision shows the end of all adversity. Sadness for this dreamer, which makes him suffer a lot in his life, so he ends it, and does not feel restless in his life. Interpretation of a comb in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: Owning a lot of money brings him great happiness in his life. Also, the vision is an expression of the distinctive features of this dreamer, as it carries qualities An idealist, he thinks about everything he gets with great wisdom. The vision is a great indication of his honesty that everyone knows. If he has anxiety in his life and saw that he was combing his hair in a dream, then this dream portends him getting rid of everything that saddens him in life and disturbs his peace. Interpretation Dreaming of a comb in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream of a comb in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl can

Interpretation of a comb in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: Owning a lot of money brings him great happiness in his life. Also, the vision is an expression of the distinctive features of this dreamer, as it carries qualities An idealist, he thinks about everything he gets with great wisdom. The vision is a great indication of his honesty that everyone knows. If he has anxiety in his life and saw that he was combing his hair in a dream, then this dream portends him getting rid of everything that saddens him in life and disturbs his peace.
